#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;
double dp[1250][1250];
bool idp[1250][1250];
double d(int k,int c)
{
       if(k>c || k<0 ||c<0)return 0;
       if(k==c)return k;
       if(idp[k][c])return dp[k][c];
       idp[k][c]=1;
       double p1,p2,p3,p4,p5;
       p1=((double)(k))/((double)(2*c-k));
       p4=((double)(1))/((double)(2*c-k-1));
       p5=((double)(k))/((double)(2*c-k-1));
       p2=p5*(1-p1);
       p3=(1-p1)*(1-p4-p5);
       p4*=(1-p1);
      // cout<<k<<" "<<p1<<" "<<p2<<" "<<p3<<" "<<c<<endl;
       dp[k][c]=0;
       if(c>=1 && k>=1)dp[k][c]+=p1*(d(k-1,c-1)+1);
       if(c>=1)dp[k][c]+=p2*(d(k,c-1)+2);
       if(c>=1)dp[k][c]+=p4*(d(k,c-1)+1);
       if(k+2<=c)dp[k][c]+=p3*(d(k+2,c)+1);
       return dp[k][c];
}
int main()
{
    int n,m;
    dp[0][1]=1;
    idp[0][1]=1;
    while(cin>>n>>m)
    {
             cout<<fixed<<setprecision(4);
             cout<<d(0,n*m/2)<<endl;
    }
}
